title: Regarding High School Clubs

replies.body: I wish I could get a club at my school, but I'm at a place where videogames are considered the spawn of Satan and staring at a screen is said to cause suicide.

one day! But first we need to develop more high school club infrastructure and school relationships. Once the scene is a bit more developed then we can start looking at hosting tournaments. But there is nothing from stopping schools currently from hosting tournaments whether thats to find the best team in a school or challenging other schools to find the best school in the city/state/country.
If the school were to do something by its self would it be supported by riot? Example Host a in school tournament.

We are definitely keen to help and support local schools hosting in school tournaments. In the [Teachers Resource](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/high-school-clubs/teacher-resource.html) info pack we have already included guides on hosting tournaments.
What are some points you would say if you were to propose this to a teacher (like positives, what it will help and what it will do in the school?)

I would definitely direct them to the high school clubs website - http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/high-school-clubs/index.html

There they can read about the teacher stories and find a tonne of resources to help them get started.
No worries! if you have any other questions let me know.
